# ADBX-31 TARNYX Escort EMP Cannon
A [color=gold]ballistic[/color] EMP cannon designed to disable large sections of enemy ships with a single, powerful shot. Requires manual reloading after 3 shots.
## Gun Specifications
- Firerate: [color=crimson]3 RPM[/color] ([color=deepskyblue]0.05 RPS[/color]) - Sell Value: [color=greenyellow][bold]1500 Spesos[/bold][/color] - Muzzle Velocity: [color=orange]200 m/s[/color] - Maximum Range: [color=orange]1400m[/color] - Power Usage (Passive): [color=turquoise]3500u/s[/color] - Capacitor Storage: [color=orange]40000u[/color] - Capacitor Recharge: [color=turquoise]214u/s[/color] - Capacitor Fire Cost: [color=turquoise]15000u[/color] - Firing Mode: [color=gold]Single Shot[/color]
